about_the_game:
Meet Dr. Cerebro, one of the most notorious medical practitioners in Solside, is a free-digger who alternates between scavenging the dark and treacherous passages of the Underside and serving time in the care of the Solside penal system (for repeatedly being caught red-handed while doing the former.)

Long days without sunlight in a cell can take your mind on a ride and the ever changing and hostile Underside is no picnic for anyone’s sanity. Dr Cerebro is starting to show worrying signs of losing it completely, and wearing that strange device as a replacement for the good old human cranium, is certainly not helping.

Nevertheless - his skills are not to be trifled with and you will not regret hiring him to your team.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:

  • OS:Windows Vista / Windows 7
  • Processor:Dual Core 2.4GHz processor
  • Memory:2 GB RAM
  • Graphics:Shader 4.0 compatible card (minimum: Nvidia GeForce 8xxx, AMD Radeon 2xxx)
  • DirectX®: DirectX11 drivers (the game support DX10 hardware)
